text: The Bemidji State Beavers women's ice hockey program represented the Bemidji State University during the 2016-17 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season. ==Offseason== *August 17: Ivana Bilic ('16) signed with the Connecticut Whale of the NWHL. ===Recruiting=== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#004225;color:#FFFFFF;" | Player || Position ||Nationality || Notes |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Lauren Bench || Goaltender ||||Attended Burnsville (MN) High School |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Abby Halluska || Forward ||||From Delano, Minnesota |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Briana Jorde || Defense || ||Played For Thief River Falls HS |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Jacqueline Kaasa || Forward || || Played 3 varsity sports at Hill Murray (MN) HS |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Haley Mack|| Forward||||Member of the Minnesota Revolution |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Heather Olson || Forward/Defense || || Attended Bemidji High School |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Kaitlin Radke|| Forward||||Attended Hastings (MN) High School |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |} ===2016–17 Beavers=== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=12 style="background:#004225;color:#FFFFFF;"| Regular Season |- !colspan=12 style="background:#004225;color:#FFFFFF;"| WCHA Tournament ==References== Bemidji State Category:Bemidji State Beavers women's ice hockey seasons Bemidji
title: 2016–17 Bemidji State Beavers women's ice hockey season
